entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
